entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Bay Roberts
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:34 AM NDT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming east 30 gusting to 50 this morning. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 11. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NDT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow at times heavy. Temperature steady near minus 1.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Amount 5 to 10 cm except 20 cm over higher terrain. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill minus 10 this evening. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NDT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Wet snow. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Snow changing to wet snow in the morning and ending late in the afternoon then cloudy. Amount 2 to 4 cm except 10 cm over higher terrain. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming light in the afternoon. Temperature steady near zero. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NDT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 2. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NDT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High plus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries. High plus 1. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NDT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NDT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.summary: Cloudy. High plus 4. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NDT Wednesday 15 March 2023
